thread.title: Mortgage Veteran Mike Ross to Lead Finance of America Mortgage Branches in Santa Clarita and the Antelope Valley

author: cnbc.com
title: Mortgage Veteran Mike Ross to Lead Finance of America Mortgage Branches in Santa Clarita and the Antelope Valley

organizations.name: lead finance of america mortgage branches

text:
LOS ANGELES--(BUSINESS WIRE)-- Finance of America Mortgage (“FAM”), a national, full service mortgage banker, announced that Santa Clarita mortgage veteran Mike Ross has joined the company as a branch manager and will be tasked with growing the FAM retail presence in the Santa Clarita/Valencia area and the Antelope Valley. The Santa Clarita/Valencia office is located at 2535 Magic Mountain Parkway, Suite 300, in Valencia, CA.
Ross brings more than 20 years of experience in the mortgage industry and a team of 15 professionals to the role. Prior to joining Finance of America Mortgage, Ross was a branch manager with loanDepot (formerly imortgage) and led a number of branch offices in Palmdale/Lancaster. Ross began his career with GMAC in 1997, and after four years, became a producing manager.
“I am incredibly excited to join Finance of America Mortgage,” said Ross. “FAM is a leader in the industry, with a comprehensive suite of products, as well as access to reverse mortgages and commercial loans, and an innovative approach to technology. Most important, FAM’s culture is centered on its people. I’m looking forward to leveraging my strong work ethic and customer-centric attitude on behalf of my team and clients at FAM.”
Ross, with his family, has been a Santa Clarita area resident for 31 years. He and his team are extremely involved in the local community and are active members of the Santa Clarita Chamber of Commerce, the Santa Clarita chapter of the National Association of Hispanic Real Estate Professionals, the Southland Regional Association of Realtors® (SRAR), the Greater Antelope Valley Association of Realtors® (GAVAR).
The Santa Clarita and Valencia branches, along with other branches throughout the region, are supported by the Southern California Operations Center. With over $200 million in funded loans per month, the Southern California Operations center located in Irvine, CA, provides a distinct operational support advantage, including underwriting, to process and close loans more quickly. The Operations center supports all branches in Los Angeles, Orange, Riverside, San Bernardino, San Luis Obispo, Santa Barbara, and Ventura Counties.
Prospective mortgage advisors interested in joining this or other branches in Santa Clarita and the Antelope Valley should contact Mike Ross at (661) 510-8076.
About Finance of America Mortgage
Finance of America Mortgage is a national, full service mortgage banker offering a diverse portfolio of home loan products. Our knowledgeable and seasoned mortgage advisors are committed to providing the most innovative technology and service for consumers, brokers, and our industry partners across the country. Finance of America Mortgage employs more than 1,400 advisors in branch offices throughout the country as well as representatives authorized to sell FAM products. For more information, please visit www.foamortgage.com or find us on Facebook , LinkedIn or Twitter . Company NMLS #1071. Equal Housing Opportunity.
